name: Root Dungeon (737BassTP)
description:
A puzzle RPG set in the roots of a huge tree.

This was made for the Global Game Jam 2023, where the theme was "Roots", using Game Maker 1.4.

In this version, only the main menu works.

In an update, the game itself will follow.

This is the link to the game's site on GGJ:

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/root-dungeon-3
